医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员设计了一步程序来提高过继性细胞免疫疗法针对实体瘤的效果研究人员开发了一种一步法来改造多功能 M1 表型巨噬细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Researchers-design-one-step-procedure-for-improving- effective-of-adoptive-cell-immunotherapy-against-solid-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Researchers-design-one-step-procedure-for-improving- effective-of-adoptive-cell-immunotherapy-against-solid-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aca6dd47-11d7-41b5-b03f-01ec4904b17e Mon, 14 Aug 2023 07:43:00 -0400 Researchers design one-step procedure for improving effective of adoptive cell immunotherapy against solid tumors
拟议的规则将使医院价格更加透明“冰淇淋多少钱？”这是一个非常简单的问题，出现在新电视和在线广告上，由一个只想吃点冷食的男人提出。柜台后面的一位女士微笑着回答：“价格？没有，我们没有了。我们有估价。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Propose-rule-would-make-hospital-prices-even-more-transparent.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Propose-rule-would-make-hospital-prices-even-more-transparent.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9f9a851-f145-4f91-860f-d1bd8d1c2535 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 06:39:01 -0400 Proposed rule would make hospital prices even more transparent
加州县的患者可能会从慈善护理和解中获得退款和债务减免加州最大的公立医院计划周一开始通知 43,000 名前患者，他们可能有资格获得退款或账单更正，这是倡导者所谓的重大法律和解的一部分，这将有助于迫使医院履行其慈善医疗义务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Patients-in-California-county-may-see-refunds-debt-relief-from-charity-care-settlement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Patients-in-California-county-may-see-refunds-debt-relief-from-charity-care-settlement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ec27abc-333a-45b6-b852-9a5c21ec12f6 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 06:37:02 -0400 Patients in California county may see refunds, debt relief from charity care settlement
揭示隐藏的威胁：CAR-T 细胞中的簇环影响癌症治疗单链可变片段 (scFv) 中的互补决定区 (CDR) 环如何影响嵌合抗原受体 (CAR)-T 细胞行为。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Unveiling-hidden-threats-clustering-loops-in-CAR-T-cells-impact-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Unveiling-hidden-threats-clustering-loops-in-CAR-T-cells-impact-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e656762c-7304-4edd-9e0c-a784def8cb9c Mon, 14 Aug 2023 06:36:00 -0400 Unveiling hidden threats: clustering loops in CAR-T cells impact cancer therapy
随着孩子的精神疾病恶化，父母发现自己的健康状况呈螺旋式上升在她十几岁的女儿试图自杀并开始在急诊室和心理健康项目之间循环后三年，莎拉·德拉罗萨注意到她自己的健康状况也下降了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Parents-see-own-health-spiral-as-their-kidse28099-mental-illnesses-worsen.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Parents-see-own-health-spiral-as-their-kidse28099-mental-illnesses-worsen.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7bb21c6c-76a1-4eec-b829-5ceec20bf45d Mon, 14 Aug 2023 06:35:25 -0400 Parents see own health spiral as their kids’ mental illnesses worsen
协同冬鲽抗菌肽揭示了增强杀菌治疗的新途径六种冬鲽 (WF) 抗菌肽 (AMP) 对细菌病原体的协同作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Synergistic-winter-flounder-antimicrobial-peptides-unveil-new-path-to-enhanced-bactericidal-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Synergistic-winter-flounder-antimicrobial-peptides-unveil-new-path-to-enhanced-bactericidal-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b64a148-5730-4849-9922-dadce3957dda Mon, 14 Aug 2023 04:52:00 -0400 Synergistic winter flounder antimicrobial peptides unveil new path to enhanced bactericidal therapy
机械取栓治疗急性缺血性卒中的当前证据和进展关于机械血栓切除术 (MT) 进展的当前证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/The-current-evidence-and-advances-in-mechanical-thrombcision-for-acute-ischaemic-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/The-current-evidence-and-advances-in-mechanical-thrombcision-for-acute-ischaemic-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b22dafb8-b302-4391-84ac-0014173f3c66 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 04:18:00 -0400 The current evidence and advances in mechanical thrombectomy for acute ischaemic stroke
美国癌症幸存者中当前饮酒和危险饮酒的流行程度是多少？研究人员描述了美国癌症幸存者的饮酒模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/What-is-the-prevalence-of-current-alcohol-conspiration-and-of-risky-alcohol-conspiration-among-cancer-survivors-in- the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/What-is-the-prevalence-of-current-alcohol-conspiration-and-of-risky-alcohol-conspiration-among-cancer-survivors-in- the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=923d119e-4cb0-43a2-9fae-86eb160951a1 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 03:26:00 -0400 What is the prevalence of current alcohol consumption and of risky alcohol consumption among cancer survivors in the US?
视觉系统中错误检测的神经标记需要注意加州大学欧文分校领导的研究小组发现，以前被认为是前注意力的大脑视觉系统中错误检测的神经标记实际上可能需要注意，并且其他神经标记可能会揭示微妙的视觉不规则性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230813/Attention-required-for-neural-marker-of-error-detection-in-visual-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230813/Attention-required-for-neural-marker-of-error-detection-in-visual-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b92141d-0cdb-4694-8595-1a60b77036f8 Sun, 13 Aug 2023 23:54:45 -0400 Attention required for neural marker of error detection in visual system
研究揭示了食用小豆蔻的健康和饮食益处德克萨斯 A&M AgriLife 的一项新研究揭示了食用小豆蔻对健康和饮食的一系列好处，包括增加食欲、减少脂肪和减少炎症，使这种香料成为“超级食品”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230813/Study-reveals-the-health-and-dietary-benefits-of-consuming-cardamom.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230813/Study-reveals-the-health-and-dietary-benefits-of-consuming-cardamom.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eee91280-befb-4d0d-87c5-d1b2eb4532d8 Sun, 13 Aug 2023 20:31:17 -0400 Study reveals the health and dietary benefits of consuming cardamom
